Key Match Events: David Warner scored 163 runs off 124 balls
Shaheen Shah Afridi took 5 wickets for 54 runs
Adam Zampa took 4 wickets for 53 runs
Post-Match Reflections: David Warner expressed that the groin is okay but still a bit sore
Pat Cummins praised the openers and mentioned the importance of carrying on in ODIs
Babar Azam acknowledged the drop in performance and the need to improve in the first ten overs
Anjan commented on the number of sixes determining the match outcome
Karthik discussed the impact of removing strike rotation after a wicket falls
David Warner emphasized the importance of running fast between wickets and working on going big at the end
Miscellaneous Highlights: Shaheen Shah Afridi's five-wicket haul was not enough to save Pakistan
Australia got two hundreds while Pakistan managed two fifties
Pakistan lost their last five wickets for 36 runs
Stoinis and Cummins played key roles in dismissing the Pakistan tailenders
Others: The match was held at M Chinnaswamy Stadium, Bengaluru
The match was a day-night 50-over game
David Warner was named the Player of the Match
